ygData.subject: PoA bard quests plus a rant
ygData.msgSnippet: Consider yourself lucky then if you found 4 giants.  I was in SRo the other day helping someone to get the Brazen Brass Kilj plans.  When we arrived, there
ygData.messageBody:
Consider yourself lucky then if you found 4 giants. I was in SRo the other
day helping someone to get the Brazen Brass Kilj plans. When we arrived,
there were no giants around plus nobody else camping them. My group killed
all kinds of lower level mobs in hopes of getting giants to spawn. We spent
over an hour and all we ever got was one giant. We gave up at that point.

Galtin of E'ci


> Actually, they nerfed the spawn of these guys. Last night
> Karana rebooted and I was the first player in Oasis (the
> server selection screen said "Karana 0"). I ran around the
> zone and was only able to find 4 giants, 2 near the SRo zone.
> If you were playing in Oasis back around May/June, you'll
> recall times when there were as many as 8 giants on your
> screen at once.
>
> In the patch messages, their rationale for nerfing the spawn
> was complaints about too many giants/griffins crashing folks
> killing orcs and gators. It happened shortly after the
> fanfare about the first player to reach level 50 though. So I
> have to wonder if this wasn't typical Verant double speak, and
> their real intent was to give the higher level folks fewer
> things to hunt to slow down their leveling.
>
